name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】ねぽらぼ学園 ☆5周年記念！！輝く学寮祭☆【#ねぽらぼ5周年学祭3Dライブ】 [-7fWewjcygo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: The members of NePoLaBo (Lamy, Nene, Botan, Polka) are discussing their upcoming performance ideas in a classroom-like setting.
A transition occurs as the scene shifts to a dorm-room stage for a solo performance.
Momosuzu Nene performs the song 'Hana ni Bourei' (Ghost in a Flower) while the other members dance in the background.

subtitles.original: まぁ、みんな好みがバラバラだしな〜
subtitles.english: Well, everyone's preferences are different.

subtitles.original: でも全部は無理くない？
subtitles.english: But isn't doing them all impossible?

subtitles.original: いや、できる！やってみなきゃ始まらない！
subtitles.english: No, we can do it! It won't start if we don't try!

subtitles.original: まさか、全部やる気？
subtitles.english: Wait, are you planning to do them all?

subtitles.original: もちろん！どれか一つなんてもったいないでしょ！全部やって良いのがあるか考えよう！
subtitles.english: Of course! Picking just one would be a waste! Let's do them all and figure out which one is best!

subtitles.original: ちょっとはお休み入れさせてね...
subtitles.english: Let us have some breaks though...

subtitles.original: だったらさ！各自、自分の部屋でやりたい曲をやっていこう！
subtitles.english: In that case! Let's each perform the songs we want in our own rooms!

subtitles.original: じゃあまずねねからねっ！この曲は〜、ねねは違う服でやる！
subtitles.english: Then I'll start! For this song... I'm going to wear a different outfit!

subtitles.original: わかった、やろうか〜
subtitles.english: Understood, let's do it.

subtitles.original: 今度こそ...これで出し物を決めるぞ〜！
subtitles.english: This time for sure... we'll decide our performance with this!

subtitles.original: じゃあやりますか！ねね、着替え終わった？
subtitles.english: Let's get started then! Nene, are you done changing?

subtitles.original: オッケーッ！それじゃあ、いきま〜す！！
subtitles.english: Okay! Well then, here I go!!

subtitles.original: もう忘れてしまったかな　夏の木陰に座ったまま
subtitles.english: I wonder if you've already forgotten, still sitting in the shade of summer

subtitles.original: 氷菓を口に放り込んで風を待っていた
subtitles.english: Tossing an ice treat into our mouths, we were waiting for the wind

subtitles.original: もう忘れてしまったかな　世の中の全部嘘だらけ
subtitles.english: I wonder if you've already forgotten, everything in the world is full of lies

subtitles.original: 本当の価値を二人で探しに行こうと笑ったこと
subtitles.english: How we laughed about going to find the true value together

subtitles.original: 忘れないように　色褪せないように
subtitles.english: So that I won't forget, so that it won't fade

subtitles.original: 形に残るものが全てじゃないように
subtitles.english: So that things that take shape aren't everything

subtitles.original: 言葉をもっと教えて
subtitles.english: Tell me more words

subtitles.original: 夏が来るって教えて
subtitles.english: Tell me that summer is coming

subtitles.original: 僕は描いてる
subtitles.english: I am drawing

subtitles.original: 眼に映ったのは夏の亡霊だ
subtitles.english: What was reflected in my eyes was a summer ghost

subtitles.original: 風にスカートが揺れて
subtitles.english: The skirt sways in the wind

subtitles.original: 想い出なんて忘れて
subtitles.english: Forget about things like memories

subtitles.original: 浅い呼吸をする
subtitles.english: Taking a shallow breath

subtitles.original: 汗を拭って夏めく
subtitles.english: Wiping away sweat, becoming like summer

subtitles.original: もう忘れてしまったかな　夏の木陰に座った頃
subtitles.english: I wonder if you've already forgotten, back when we sat in the shade of summer

subtitles.original: 遠くの丘から顔出した雲があったじゃないか
subtitles.english: There was a cloud peeking out from the distant hill, wasn't there?

subtitles.original: 君はそれを掴もうとして、馬鹿みたいに空を切った手で
subtitles.english: You tried to grab it, with your hand cutting through the air like a fool

subtitles.original: 僕は紙に雲一つを書いて、笑って握って見せて
subtitles.english: I drew a single cloud on paper, laughed, and showed it to you in my hand

subtitles.original: 忘れないように　色褪せないように
subtitles.english: So that I won't forget, so that it won't fade

subtitles.original: 歴史に残るものが全てじゃないから
subtitles.english: Because things that remain in history aren't everything

subtitles.original: 今だけ顔も失くして
subtitles.english: Just for now, lose your face too

subtitles.original: 言葉も全部忘れて
subtitles.english: Forget all the words too

subtitles.original: 君は笑ってる
subtitles.english: You're laughing

subtitles.original: 夏を待っている僕ら亡霊だ
subtitles.english: We're ghosts waiting for summer

subtitles.original: 心をもっと教えて
subtitles.english: Tell me more about your heart

subtitles.original: 夏の匂いを教えて
subtitles.english: Tell me about the scent of summer

subtitles.original: 浅い呼吸をする
subtitles.english: Taking a shallow breath

subtitles.original: 忘れないように　色褪せないように
subtitles.english: So that I won't forget, so that it won't fade

subtitles.original: 心に響くものが全てじゃないから
subtitles.english: Because things that resonate in the heart aren't everything

subtitles.original: 言葉をもっと教えて
subtitles.english: Tell me more words

subtitles.original: さよならだって教えて
subtitles.english: Tell me even about goodbyes

subtitles.original: 今も見るんだよ、夏に咲いている花に亡霊を
subtitles.english: I still see it now, the ghost in the flowers blooming in summer

subtitles.original: 言葉じゃなくて時間を
subtitles.english: Not words, but time

subtitles.original: 時間じゃなくて心を
subtitles.english: Not time, but the heart

subtitles.original: 浅い呼吸をする、汗を拭って夏めく
subtitles.english: Taking a shallow breath, wiping away sweat, becoming like summer

subtitles.original: 夏の匂いがする
subtitles.english: It smells like summer

subtitles.original: 夏の匂いがする
subtitles.english: It smells like summer

subtitles.original: もう忘れてしまったかな　夏の木陰に座ったまま
subtitles.english: I wonder if you've already forgotten, still sitting in the shade of summer

subtitles.original: 氷菓を口に放り込んで風を待っていた
subtitles.english: Tossing an ice treat into our mouths, we were waiting for the wind
